textDescriptions.scattering coefficient:
type: mie,
        orders: all,
        f: 0.01,
d: 0,
        medium: { material: AlGaAs, eps: adachi_simple, df: 0.0, cAl: 0.3, df: 0.1 },
        particles: { type: Drude, r: 10.6, w: 14.6, G: 0.5, eps_inf: 1.0 };
textDescriptions.permittivity:
type: excitonic,
medium: { material: GaAs, eps: adachi_simple, df: 0.0 },
exciton: { w0: 1.5, G0: 0.0005, G: 0.01, wb: 1.5, Gb: 0.0002, B: 1, C: 1 },
d: 10
